51 template <unsigned _N = 1>
52 class KroneckerDeltaTile {
53  public:
54  // Constants
55  static constexpr unsigned N = _N;
56  // Concept typedefs
57  typedef TiledArray::Range range_type; // range type
58  typedef int value_type; // Element type
59  typedef value_type
60  numeric_type; // The scalar type that is compatible with value_type
61  typedef size_t size_type; // Size type
62 
63  private:
64  range_type range_;
65  bool empty_;
66 
67  public:
69  KroneckerDeltaTile() : empty_(true) {}
70 
72  KroneckerDeltaTile(const range_type& range)
73  : range_(range), empty_(is_empty(range_)) {}
74 
76  KroneckerDeltaTile(const KroneckerDeltaTile&) = default;
77 
79  KroneckerDeltaTile& operator=(const KroneckerDeltaTile& other) = default;
80 
82  KroneckerDeltaTile clone() const {
83  KroneckerDeltaTile result(*this);
84  return result;
85  }
86 
87  range_type range() const { return range_; }
88 
89  bool empty() const { return empty_; }
90 
92  template <typename Archive>
93  void serialize(Archive& ar) {
94  std::cout << "KroneckerDelta::serialize not implemented by design!"
95  << std::endl;
96  abort(); // should never travel
97  }
98 
99  private:
101  static bool is_empty(const range_type& range) {
102  bool empty = false;
103  TA_ASSERT(range.rank() == 2 * N);
104  auto lobound = range.lobound_data();
105  auto upbound = range.upbound_data();
106  for (auto i = 0; i != 2 * N && not empty; i += 2)
107  empty = (upbound[i] > lobound[i + 1] && upbound[i + 1] > lobound[i])
108  ? true
109  : false; // assumes extents > 0
110  return empty;
111  }
112 
113 }; // class KroneckerDeltaTile
114 
115 // these are to satisfy interfaces, but not needed, actually
116 
117 // Sum of hyper diagonal elements
118 template <unsigned _N>
119 typename KroneckerDeltaTile<_N>::numeric_type trace(
120  const KroneckerDeltaTile<_N>& arg);
121 // foreach(i) result += arg[i]
122 template <unsigned _N>
123 typename KroneckerDeltaTile<_N>::numeric_type sum(
124  const KroneckerDeltaTile<_N>& arg);
125 // foreach(i) result *= arg[i]
126 template <unsigned _N>
127 typename KroneckerDeltaTile<_N>::numeric_type product(
128  const KroneckerDeltaTile<_N>& arg);
129 // foreach(i) result += arg[i] * arg[i]
130 template <unsigned _N>
131 typename KroneckerDeltaTile<_N>::numeric_type squared_norm(
132  const KroneckerDeltaTile<_N>& arg);
133 // foreach(i) result = min(result, arg[i])
134 template <unsigned _N>
135 typename KroneckerDeltaTile<_N>::numeric_type min(
136  const KroneckerDeltaTile<_N>& arg);
137 // foreach(i) result = max(result, arg[i])
138 template <unsigned _N>
139 typename KroneckerDeltaTile<_N>::numeric_type max(
140  const KroneckerDeltaTile<_N>& arg);
141 // foreach(i) result = abs_min(result, arg[i])
142 template <unsigned _N>
143 typename KroneckerDeltaTile<_N>::numeric_type abs_min(
144  const KroneckerDeltaTile<_N>& arg);
145 // foreach(i) result = abs_max(result, arg[i])
146 template <unsigned _N>
147 typename KroneckerDeltaTile<_N>::numeric_type abs_max(
148  const KroneckerDeltaTile<_N>& arg);

153 template <unsigned N>
154 KroneckerDeltaTile<N> permute(const KroneckerDeltaTile<N>& tile,
155  const TiledArray::Permutation& perm) {
156  abort();
157 }

176  const KroneckerDeltaTile<N>& arg1) {

178  return result;

180 
181 // Contraction operation
182 
183 // GEMM operation with fused indices as defined by gemm_config:
184 // dense_result[i,j] = dense_arg1[i,k] * sparse_arg2[k,j]
185 template <typename T, unsigned N>
186 TiledArray::Tensor<T> gemm(
187  const KroneckerDeltaTile<N>& arg1, const TiledArray::Tensor<T>& arg2,
188  const typename TiledArray::Tensor<T>::numeric_type factor,
189  const TiledArray::math::GemmHelper& gemm_config) {
190  // preconditions:
191  // 1. implemented only outer product
192  assert(gemm_config.result_rank() ==
193  gemm_config.left_rank() + gemm_config.right_rank());
194 
195  auto arg1_range = arg1.range();
196  auto arg2_range = arg2.range();
197  auto result_range =
198  gemm_config.make_result_range<TiledArray::Range>(arg1_range, arg2_range);
199  TiledArray::Tensor<T> result(result_range, 0);
200 
201  auto result_data = result.data();
202  auto arg1_extents = arg1_range.extent_data();
203  auto arg2_data = arg2.data();
204  auto arg2_volume = arg2_range.volume();
205 
206  if (not arg1.empty()) {
207  switch (N) {
208  case 1: {
209  auto i0_range = std::min(arg1_extents[0], arg1_extents[1]);
210  for (decltype(i0_range) i0 = 0; i0 != i0_range; ++i0) {
211  auto result_i0i0_ptr =
212  result_data + (i0 * arg1_extents[1] + i0) * arg2_volume;
213  std::copy(arg2_data, arg2_data + arg2_volume, result_i0i0_ptr);
214  }
215  } break;
216  case 2: {
217  auto i0_range = std::min(arg1_extents[0], arg1_extents[1]);
218  auto i1_range = std::min(arg1_extents[2], arg1_extents[3]);
219  auto ndim23 = arg1_extents[2] * arg1_extents[3];
220  for (decltype(i0_range) i0 = 0; i0 != i0_range; ++i0) {
221  auto result_i0i0i1i1_ptr_offset =
222  result_data + (i0 * arg1_extents[1] + i0) * ndim23 * arg2_volume;
223  for (decltype(i1_range) i1 = 0; i1 != i1_range; ++i1) {
224  auto result_i0i0i1i1_ptr =
225  result_i0i0i1i1_ptr_offset +
226  (i1 * arg1_extents[3] + i1) * arg2_volume;
227  std::copy(arg2_data, arg2_data + arg2_volume, result_i0i0i1i1_ptr);
228  }
229  }
230  } break;
231 
232  default:
233  abort(); // not implemented
234  }
235  }
236 
237  return result;
238 }
239 // GEMM operation with fused indices as defined by gemm_config:
240 // dense_result[i,j] += dense_arg1[i,k] * sparse_arg2[k,j]
241 template <typename T, unsigned N>
242 void gemm(TiledArray::Tensor<T>& result, const KroneckerDeltaTile<N>& arg1,
243  const TiledArray::Tensor<T>& arg2,
244  const typename TiledArray::Tensor<T>::numeric_type factor,
245  const TiledArray::math::GemmHelper& gemm_config) {
246  abort();
247 }
